text: @FredTJoseph @gofundme IVE LEFT 30+COMMENTS SINCE THIS STARTED AND I JUST DONT GET HELPED.BEEN TRYIN FOR HELP SINCE COVID19 STARTED AND BEEN OVERLOOKED. SINGLE MOM THATS BEEN LAID OFF AND NEED TO FEED MY MOM AND DAUGHTER SO NOT EATING MYSELF! IM BEGGIN FOR HELP $QUEENFOXXYDIN 😥🙏🏽
